p: Western blot was performed with the total lysates using RIPA buffer (Hyclone, Los Angeles, CA, USA). Same amounts of protein were subjected to SDS-PAGE, and then transferred to nitrocellulose membranes (PALL, Cortland, NY, USA). After blocking with 5% milk solution, the membranes were incubated at 4 °C with respective antibody overnight, followed by the incubation with a secondary antibody. Finally, the blot was visualised by enhanced chemiluminescence kit (Thermo Fisher, Waltham, MA, USA).
